description: Comprising a wine boutique and a wine bar in its rustic-style room on the ground floor, Enoteca Meucci is also home to a restaurant in the more elegant, classic-style rooms on the first floor. The expertly prepared cuisine is colourful and contemporary in style, with a focus on regional ingredients. Beautiful outdoor area for summer dining.
